data.actual_result: In-app notification doesn’t ellipse if the last character in the third line is a line break
data.expected_result: In-app notification ellipses when the text extends past a third line
data.short_description: In-app notifications don’t ellipse if there’s a linebreak at the end of the third row
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a person send you a DM where the third line ends in a line break - Example: “Not if you tell your boss ‘no u’ Then they’re fired, and you take their job Not if you tell your boss ‘no u’ Then they’re fired, and you take their job” with linebreaks before each “Then” - Observe if the in-app notification ellipses-  Have the same person DM you that message, but change the line breaks to spaces - Observe the in-app notification again for any ellipses
